snippet: FBI agents arrested a New Mexico sheriff and his son on Friday after the lawman allegedly pistol-whipped a motorist following a high-speed car chase, officials said....

headline.print_headline: Sheriff and Son Accused of Pistol-Whipping New Mexico Motorist
headline.main: Sheriff and Son Accused of Pistol-Whipping New Mexico Motorist

lead_paragraph: FBI agents arrested a New Mexico sheriff and his son on Friday after the lawman allegedly pistol-whipped a motorist following a high-speed car chase, officials said.
